useCase.name: Enable Step Counter Feature

preconditions.precondition: ALFRED Device and Software are operational.

successEndConditions.condition: Step Counter feature is successfully enabled for the User.

useCase.trigger: Caregiver requests to enable the Step Counter feature for the User.

mainSequence.step: Caregiver requests to enable Step Counter feature for User.
ALFRED Software confirms Step Counter activation.
ALFRED Device notifies User about the availability of Step Counter feature.
